text.p:
This writ petition has been filed to direct the respondents to grant
permission for Sendamelam on 18-02-2020 at about 10.00 a.m to 01.00
p.m in connection with the palkudam Eduthu Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal,
again 05.00 p.m. to 09.00 p.m. Theesatti Eduthu Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal
and midnight 01.00 hours Karagattam, Sapparam Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal
in Arulmigu sri Muppidathi Amman Kovil "Masi Festival" situated at
Vadakarai, Tenkasi District.

2. Heard the learned Counsel appearing for the petitioner and the
learned Additional Public Prosecutor appearing for the respondents.

3.The learned Additional Public Prosecutor
appearing for the
respondents would submit that they have no objection in granting
permission, but, in the guise of conducting Radhaveethi Ula, the petitioner
shall not disturb persons belonging to the other community and other
religions and that the respondents shall take in to consideration the ground
situation, will restrict the time period for conducting Radhaveethi Ula. He
would further submit that the Director General of Police, in his proceedings
2/6
in Rc.No.007301/Genl.I(1)/2019 dated 09.04.2019 has issued circular to
Commissioner of Police, Superintendent of Police and all the Station Housing
Officer and directed them to follow the procedure and instruct the petitioner
seeking permission to conduct cultural programs viz., Sendamelam, to
comply with the conditions and permission may be granted subject to the
petitioner agreeing to comply with the said conditions by filing necessary
undertaking before the respondent police.

4. The respondents police are directed to grant permission for
conducting the cultural programme (ie.,) Sendamelam on 18.02.2020 at
about 10.00 a.m to 01.00 p.m in connection with the Palkudam Eduthu
Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal, again 05.00 p.m. to 09.00 p.m. Theesatti Eduthu
Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal and midnight 01.00 hours Karagattam, Sapparam
Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal in Arulmigu Sri Muppidathi Amman Kovil "Masi
Festival" situated at Vadakarai, Tenkasi District, by enclosing the following
conditions:

list.item:
(a) The Sendamelam in connection with the Palkudam
Eduthu Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal, Theesatti Eduthu Radhaveethi
Ula Varuthal, Karagattam, Sapparam Radhaveethi Ula Varuthal
festival or any cultural programme should be completed within
the time specified by the SHO.

(c) no songs, touching upon any political party or religion,
community or caste be played;

(d) Organizers shall not erect any digital banners/pla cards
on either side of the arterial roads, platforms, walkways/major
roads and any other roads

(e) the function should not affect caste, religious or
communal harmony and shall be conducted without any
discrimination

(g) similarly, the Police is empowered to stop the
programme, if it exceeds beyond the permitted time;

(h) if any untoward incident takes place, the organizers of
the programme be made responsible for the same

(i) the authority concerned shall videograph the entire
programme at the cost of the applicant and submit the CD to the
S.P concerned.

(j)Organizers shall have to obtain all other required
permission from the authorities concerned

(k)Any other conditions as the authority concerned consider
to impose according to the ground reality".

text.p:
5. The petitioner is also directed to ensure that the conditions are
strictly complied with and they will not create any noise pollution disturbing
the persons belonging to other community and religions and also to ensure
that no law and order problem is created in the course of conducting the
festival.

6. The writ petition stands disposed of with the above directions.
However, there shall be no order as to costs.
